title: Part A
stimulusHtml:

One point is earned for a correct identification
descriptions: The response does not provide a correct identification or provides only one of the following correct identifications:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for the correct explanation
descriptions: The response does not correctly provide one of the following explanations for why all of Southeast Asia is shaded in a single color in the world map, whereas Southeast Asian countries are shaded differently in the regional map:

The response correctly provides ONE of the following explanations for why all of Southeast Asia is shaded in a single color in the world map, whereas Southeast Asian countries are shaded differently in the regional map:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct description
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe what the rice production data for Southeast Asia and West Africa imply about the intensity of land use in these areas using both of the following:
The response correctly describes what the rice production data for Southeast Asia and West Africa imply about the intensity of land use in these areas using BOTH of the following:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:

descriptions: The response does not correctly describe any one of the following technological advancements that made the Green Revolution possible:
The response correctly describes ONE of the following technological advancements that made the Green Revolution possible:

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct explanation
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain how the Green Revolution affected farmers in less developed countries using any one of the following:

title: Part F
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct explanation
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain the degree to which mechanization changed rice production in less developed countries using any one of the following:

title: Part G
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct explanation
descriptions: The response does not provide any one of the following correct explanations of how agricultural chemicals contributed to the change in rice production in less developed countries:
